sense.gloss: kinpira gobō, braised burdock root, chopped burdock root (and sometimes carrot) cooked in sugar and soy sauce
scorzonera (Scorzonera hispanica), Spanish salsify, viper's grass
Cirsium dipsacolepis (perennial plant of the thistle family)
pulling something out (in a stroke), plucking out
forcibly removing one after another (e.g. demonstrators)
overtaking multiple people (in a spurt), pulling ahead
great burdock sold covered with soil
stone wall construction technique, with smallest stone surfaces facing outwards, burdock piling

sdata.j: ↑牛蒡↑↓ごぼう↓の↑天↑↓てん↓ぷらを↑食↑↓た↓べました。
sdata.e: I ate a greater burdock tempura.

sdata.j: ↑牛蒡↑↓ごぼう↓の↑天↑↓てん↓ぷらを↑食↑↓た↓べました。
sdata.e: I ate a burdock root tempura.
